name: Blooming Egg
description:
I found it sad when see someone wants to do something but they are still doubting themselves to make a decision and to take a chance and say

“Nah, I don’t think I can do that”
“I don’t think that’ll work”
“I’m afraid that I won’t succeed”
So they decided to bury that dream.

Confucius says “We actually have two lives, the second one begins when we realize we only have one.”

I believe that in the second life is the most happiest moments compare to the ones before, when we realized that we only live once. At first we hesitated and being afraid to make a decision, now it’s going to be much more easier for us to take the decisions.

So never burry your dreams because dreams can never die, no matter how deep you bury your dream, it will only faint and it will come back again when we are old in a form of regrets.

The egg that represent a new life and the white gerbera daisy has symbolized the innocent hearts of children, and happiness and gratefulness for the life you have been given.

“Carpe Diem. Seize the day.”
